mapper.select: select v_id, v_status, v_price, v_discount, v_createtime, v_endtime, test1, test2 from vip where v_id = #{vId}
mapper.insert: insert into vip(v_status, v_price, v_discount, v_createtime, v_endtime, test1, test2) values (#{vStatus}, #{vPrice}, #{vDiscount}, #{vCreatetime}, #{vEndtime}, #{test1}, #{test2})

insert into vip(v_status, v_price, v_discount, v_createtime, v_endtime, test1, test2) values
(#{entity.vStatus}, #{entity.vPrice}, #{entity.vDiscount}, #{entity.vCreatetime}, #{entity.vEndtime}, #{entity.test1}, #{entity.test2})

insert into vip(v_status, v_price, v_discount, v_createtime, v_endtime, test1, test2) values
(#{entity.vStatus}, #{entity.vPrice}, #{entity.vDiscount}, #{entity.vCreatetime}, #{entity.vEndtime}, #{entity.test1}, #{entity.test2})
on duplicate key update v_status = values(v_status), v_price = values(v_price), v_discount = values(v_discount), v_createtime = values(v_createtime), v_endtime = values(v_endtime), test1 = values(test1), test2 = values(test2)
mapper.update:
update vip
v_status = #{vStatus},
v_price = #{vPrice},
v_discount = #{vDiscount},
v_createtime = #{vCreatetime},
v_endtime = #{vEndtime},
test1 = #{test1},
test2 = #{test2},
where v_id = #{vId}
